picture.description: One of Picture, Base64Picture or UrlPicture should be used

base64Picture.description: One of Picture, Base64Picture or UrlPicture should be used

urlPicture.description: One of Picture, Base64Picture or UrlPicture should be used

fileName.description: Optional, used to get file type (.jpg is default)

dataId.description: Only first task will be commented by DataId

DispatchAction.description:
Flow_Create = 0
Flow_Start = 1
Flow_Complete = 2
Flow_Discard = 3
Flow_DueTimeMissed = 4
Flow_Update = 5
Section_Start = 10
Section_Comment = 11
Section_CommentComplete = 12
Section_Override = 13
Section_Complete = 14
Section_Clear = 15
Task_Update = 20
Task_Modify = 21
Task_Clear = 22
Task_Comment = 23
Task_CommentComplete = 24
Task_Override = 25
Task_Reminder = 26
Unknown = 100

content.description: One of Content, Base64Content or UrlContent should be used

base64Content.description: One of Content, Base64Content or UrlContent should be used

urlContent.description: One of Content, Base64Content or UrlContent should be used

fileName.description: Optional, used to get file type (.jpg is default)

HistoryAction.description:
Create = 0
Edit = 1
Remove = 2
OrderInnerObjects = 3
Finish = 4
Start = 5
Override = 6
NewRevision = 7
Comment = 8
CommentComplete = 9
Revert = 10
Approve = 11
Recover = 12

refId.description: RefId of template, should be passed if Id not passed

previousSectionId.description: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 to put it first, null to put it last

picture.description: One of Picture, Base64Picture or UrlPicture should be used

base64Picture.description: One of Picture, Base64Picture or UrlPicture should be used

urlPicture.description: One of Picture, Base64Picture or UrlPicture should be used

fileName.description: Optional, used to get file type (.jpg is default)

status.description: Allowed values: ActiveAndReady, Completed, Discarded, Archived

location.description: Specific location, token location will be used if not passed

templateMetadataTitles.description: Template should contain specific metadata titles

templateMetadataValues.description: Template should contain specific metadata values

TaskType.description:
Text = 0
Number = 1
Dropdown = 2
Date = 3
DateAndTime = 4
Time = 5
Checkbox = 6
RadioButtons = 7
LongText = 8
PersonsOnBoard = 9
List = 10
Picture = 11
Information = 12
GPS = 13
ScanLabel = 14
RichText = 15
File = 16
DataRegister = 17
SystemLists = 18
Email = 19
Sign = 20
PhoneNumber = 21

name.description: Will be updated only if set and not empty

secondaryTitle.description: Will be updated only if set, can apply empty value

content.description: Will be updated only if set, can apply empty value

isMarkdown.description: Set this flag to convert markdown to html

Bearer.description: Auth Token (also header:"Impersonate" can be used with user id)
Bearer.name: Authorization
